items.title: Upgrade to Capacitor 7.5.0 and Android SDK 35 in Nexior ðŸš€
items.summary: This update enhances the Nexior project by upgrading Capacitor to version 7.5.0, along with the Android SDK to 35 and Gradle to 8.11.1. The minimum SDK version has been increased from 22 to 23, ensuring compatibility with the latest features. Additionally, the release signing configuration has been improved for better security and deployment.
